name: smoozoo
description: This is Smoozoo - a super-smooth, performant and modern image viewer for the web

scripts.buildminimal: npm run prebuild && npx parcel build src/examples/minimal.html --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --public-url ./ --no-scope-hoist
scripts.OLDbuildtauri: npx parcel build src/examples/tauri.html --no-source-maps --public-url ./ && mv dist/tauri.html dist/index.html

author: Joakim Romland
